channel.title: unix til on
channel.description: Recent content in unix til on

item.title: Regex for Validating Password
item.description: This regex can be use to validate password ((?=.*\d)(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*[\W]).{8,20}) description: ( # Start of group (?=.*\d) # must contains one digit from 0-9 (?=.*[a-z]) # must contains one lowercase characters (?=.*[\W]) # must contains at least one special character . # match anything with previous condition checking {8,20} # length at least 8 characters and maximum of 20 ) # End of group
